name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.braiding_naturality
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
‚Ñ¨ : (X Y : C) ‚Üí CategoryTheory.Limits.LimitCone (CategoryTheory.Limits.pair X Y)
X X' Y Y' : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom X' Y'
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ f g) (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ Y Y').isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Y' Y).isLimit).hom) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X X').isLimit (‚Ñ¨ X' X).isLimit).hom (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ g f))
decl:
theorem braiding_naturality {X X' Y Y' : C} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : X' ‚ü∂ Y') :
    tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ f g ‚â´ (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ Y Y').isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Y' Y).isLimit).hom =
      (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X X').isLimit (‚Ñ¨ X' X).isLimit).hom ‚â´ tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ g f := by
  dsimp [tensorHom, Limits.BinaryFan.braiding]
  apply (‚Ñ¨ _ _).isLimit.hom_ext
  rintro ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü©‚ü© <;> ¬∑ dsimp [Limits.IsLimit.conePointUniqueUpToIso]; simp

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.hexagon_forward
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
‚Ñ¨ : (X Y : C) ‚Üí CategoryTheory.Limits.LimitCone (CategoryTheory.Limits.pair X Y)
X Y Z : C
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Y Z).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ Y Z)).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ Y Z) X).isLimit).hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Y Z X).hom)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Y).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Y X).isLimit).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id Z)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Y X Z).hom (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id Y) (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z X).isLimit).hom)))
decl:
theorem hexagon_forward (X Y Z : C) :
    (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Y Z).hom ‚â´
        (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X (tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ Y Z)).isLimit
              (‚Ñ¨ (tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ Y Z) X).isLimit).hom ‚â´
          (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Y Z X).hom =
      tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Y).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Y X).isLimit).hom (ùüô Z) ‚â´
        (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Y X Z).hom ‚â´
          tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (ùüô Y) (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z X).isLimit).hom := by
  dsimp [tensorHom, Limits.BinaryFan.braiding]
  apply (‚Ñ¨ _ _).isLimit.hom_ext; rintro ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü©‚ü©
  ¬∑ dsimp [Limits.IsLimit.conePointUniqueUpToIso]; simp
  ¬∑ apply (‚Ñ¨ _ _).isLimit.hom_ext
    rintro ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü©‚ü© <;> ¬∑ dsimp [Limits.IsLimit.conePointUniqueUpToIso]; simp

initialProofState:

inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
‚Ñ¨ : (X Y : C) ‚Üí CategoryTheory.Limits.LimitCone (CategoryTheory.Limits.pair X Y)
X Y Z : C
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Y Z).inv (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ X Y) Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ X Y)).isLimit).hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Z X Y).inv)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id X) (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ Y Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z Y).isLimit).hom) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Z Y).inv (CategoryTheory.MonoidalOfChosenFiniteProducts.tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (CategoryTheory.Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z X).isLimit).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id Y))))
decl:
theorem hexagon_reverse (X Y Z : C) :
    (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Y Z).inv ‚â´
        (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ (tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ X Y) Z).isLimit
              (‚Ñ¨ Z (tensorObj ‚Ñ¨ X Y)).isLimit).hom ‚â´
          (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ Z X Y).inv =
      tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (ùüô X) (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ Y Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z Y).isLimit).hom ‚â´
        (BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone ‚Ñ¨ X Z Y).inv ‚â´
          tensorHom ‚Ñ¨ (Limits.BinaryFan.braiding (‚Ñ¨ X Z).isLimit (‚Ñ¨ Z X).isLimit).hom (ùüô Y) := by
  dsimp [tensorHom, Limits.BinaryFan.braiding]
  apply (‚Ñ¨ _ _).isLimit.hom_ext; rintro ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü©‚ü©
  ¬∑ apply (‚Ñ¨ _ _).isLimit.hom_ext
    rintro ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü©‚ü© <;>
      ¬∑ dsimp [BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone, BinaryFan.associator,

        simp
  ¬∑ dsimp [BinaryFan.associatorOfLimitCone, BinaryFan.associator,
      Limits.IsLimit.conePointUniqueUpToIso]
    simp

decl:
theorem symmetry (X Y : C) :
